description: A Flutter widget named SectionHeader that displays a section title with optional icon and action button, used for listing sections like 'Popular' or 'Favorites'.

classes.name: SectionHeader
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a section header with a title, optional leading icon, and optional action button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the SectionHeader, arranging icon, title, and optional action button.
